name: load-funnel-test
description: Load testing for sales funnels with Playwright

scripts.test:demoblaze:all: npm run clean && npx playwright test tests/demoblaze --workers=10 --repeat-each=100; npm run dashboard
scripts.test:chrome: npm run clean && npx playwright test tests/demoblaze/checkout.spec.js --workers=10 --repeat-each=50; npm run dashboard
scripts.test:chrome-heavy: npm run clean && npx playwright test tests/demoblaze/checkout.spec.js --workers=20 --repeat-each=160; npm run dashboard
scripts.test:android: npm run clean && DEVICE=android npx playwright test tests/demoblaze/checkout.spec.js --workers=10 --repeat-each=50; npm run dashboard
scripts.test:android-landscape: npm run clean && DEVICE=android-landscape npx playwright test tests/demoblaze/checkout.spec.js --workers=10 --repeat-each=50; npm run dashboard
scripts.test:iphone: npm run clean && DEVICE=iphone npx playwright test tests/demoblaze/checkout.spec.js --workers=10 --repeat-each=50; npm run dashboard
scripts.test:iphone-landscape: npm run clean && DEVICE=iphone-landscape npx playwright test tests/demoblaze/checkout.spec.js --workers=10 --repeat-each=50; npm run dashboard
